author: tkormann
msg: No more cache policy, as I don't have enough informations to determine
whether or not a document is in its build phase
- Does not work yet with external <use> as the bridge is analyzing a clone.
Will be fixed after 1.0 (or after the linking support)

author: tkormann
msg: - Add shape-rendering, text-rendering, and image-rendering support.
Image rendering seems to be not well supported in Java2D
Text rendering does not work (The RenderingHints is TEXT_* and I think
the drawing order are not text related but shape)
For seeing the match between SVG and Java2D, see CSSUtilities class

author: deweese
msg: Added kernelUnitLength support to the interface.
It currently defaults to using device space (backwards compatible)
